actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.
Committee on Finance requested executive comment from OMB, Treasury Department, Health and Human Services Department.

official_title: A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to provide that services furnished by a clinical social worker shall be reimbursable under medicare when furnished by a health maintenance organization to a member of that organization.

summary.text: Amends title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act to provide coverage for services furnished by a clinical social worker to a member of a health maintenance organization.

titles.title: A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to provide that services furnished by a clinical social worker shall be reimbursable under medicare when furnished by a health maintenance organization to a member of that organization.
